title: FFVII Remake New Details - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.20.19
description:
Get $10 off your first order of $15 when you use promo code "KindaFunny" https://grhb.me/kindafunny

Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://GetQuip.com/games right now, you can get your first refill pack for FREE.

Go to http://Brooklinen.com and use promo code GAMES for 10% off AND free shipping.

On today's show Andrea and Tim chat about the changes coming to Destiny's 2 premium Everse store, the unfortunate Bloodstained game-breaking bug, new details revealed by Nomura-san on FFVII Remake, and a breaking news story about former EA exec Patrick Soderlund's $20M bonus, and where it went.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:20 - Housekeeping
Watch Andrea stream for GuardianCon’s St. Jude’s Charity Marathon from 5:00pm-9:00pm PT TONIGHT! Twitch.tv/guardiancon or we’ll be hosting on our Twitch at twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Daniel Massey, Black Jack, Colton Yoder, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:03:45 - Bungie is overhauling Destiny 2’s Eververse in-game store - via Polygon
00:11:45 - Bloodstained Progression Bug
00:15:30 - Final Fantasy 7 Remake New Details: Original Events, Honey Bee Inn Cross-Dressing, and More - via US Gamer, Matt Kim
00:25:00 - Patrick Söderlund's $20m retention bonus didn't leave EA with him - via
gamesindustry.biz, Rebekah Valentine
00:27:50 - Out today
00:33:00 -  GrubHub
00:34:32 - Broklinen
00:35:52 - Quip
Reader mail   -
00:37:40 - Has there been a franchise that you've ignored forever that you finally go around to only to discover you love it? And if not, is there a franchise that you suspect will fall into that category once you do give it a shot? - Emmett (Ejsponge61) Watkins Jr.
00:46:22 - What old/classic games do you wish were readily available to replay in modern platforms? - TwoHeadedGiant
00:52:55 - Squad Up: Ryan T From Tennessee (Xbox And/Or Steam) - onelastword
00:53:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Fran and Tim
